column1: Dino is at a big party with his friends. Dino wants to share a big
column2: thin cake with his friends. The cake is on a high table. Suddenly
column3: a small dog jumps on the table and eats the cake. Dino goes to the shop to buy a new cake.;cake

column1: Caden is in his new house. Caden wants to fix all the things that are not right. There is a big leak in the roof. Suddenly
column2: the sun comes out and dries up the leak. Caden decides to go out and play.;leak

column1: Vivi is in her room playing with her toys. Vivi wants to lay her small
column2: patient triangle toy on the shelf with her other toys. The triangle toy is in her toy box. Suddenly
column3: her baby brother crawls into the room and takes the triangle toy. Vivi goes to find another triangle toy.;triangle toy

column1: Ira is in her big room. Ira wants to draw on her weird desk. The desk is very clean. Suddenly
column2: a big wind blows through the window and makes the desk very dirty. Ira gets a cloth to clean the desk.;desk

column1: Wally is sitting in his room after a long day. Wally wants to draw a calm picture with his pastels. The pastels are in a big box. Suddenly
column2: a gust of wind blows through the open window and scatters the pastels all over the room. Wally starts to pick up the pastels from the floor.;pastels

column1: Remy is in the woods by the river. Remy wants to build a boat with a big
column2: shy log. The log is very heavy. Suddenly
column3: a strong wind blows and moves the log to the river. Remy goes to look for another log.;log

column1: Jack is in the kitchen in his house. Jack wants a cold drink from the refrigerator. The refrigerator is full of fresh food. Suddenly
column2: a power cut changes the state of the food in the refrigerator to spoiled. Jack decides to throw away the spoiled food.;refrigerator

column1: Polly is in a busy room cleaning up. Polly wants to make the room clean with her new mop. The mop is in the corner of the room. Suddenly
column2: a gust of wind blows through the window and stirs the mop out of the room. Polly goes to the shop to buy a new mop.;mop

column1: Uma is in a room full of toys. Uma wants to find an easy pin to play with. The pin is in the big toy box. Suddenly
column2: a bird flies in through the window and takes the pin away. Uma looks for another toy to play with.;Pin

column1: Olivia is in a field full of giant flowers. Olivia wants to find the most beautiful giant flower to take a picture of it. There is a persistent bee buzzing around one of the giant flowers. Suddenly
column2: a gust of wind blows the bee away. Olivia moves closer to the flower without the bee to take a picture.;Bee
